alert.note: Alert for Finney (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 21 at 12:56AM CDT until July 21 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Finney County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 1256 AM CDT, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Several road closures and water rescues from stranded vehicles were reported in Garden City. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Garden City, Holcomb and Friend. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
